1580-1820: Founding of the Sultanate for Champa

Back to Index

144000. Founding of the Sultanate

Champa — Not random

Conditions

  • None of the following must occur:
    • State religion is sunni
    • State religion is eastern_sunni
    • State religion is shia
    • State religion is eastern_shia

Will happen within 400 days of January 2, 1580
Checked again every 400 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1820)

Description

With the adoption of Bani Islam in Champa, the area became a Muslim Kingdom.

Actions

A. Convert to Bani Islam

  • Change religion to eastern_shia
  • Centralization +1
  • Serfdom +1
  • +2 missionaries
  • Stability -2

B. Convert to True Islam

  • Change religion to eastern_sunni
  • Aristocracy -1
  • Mercantilism -1
  • +2 missionaries
  • Stability -2

C. Honor the beliefs of our ancestors

  • Innovativeness -1
  • Offensive Doctrine -1
  • Stability +1
